messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] Re: I didnt get the sword as pictured in the ebay auction ...
messages.msgSnippet: I never saw the sword.  However, the swastika was used as a mon (family crest), but as I recall it was the mirror image to that used by the Nazis. Sincerely
messages.messageBody:
I never saw the sword. However, the swastika was used as a mon (family crest), but as I recall it was the mirror image to that used by the Nazis.


Sincerely Yours,

Michael Harris

http://www.satcho.com Specialists in books related to the study & appreciation of the Japanese sword as art.

The Nihonto Community Calendar http://www.satcho.com/calendar A calendar of Japanese sword club meetings and events around the world that may be set as your home page. It includes a search engine, world clocks, currency converter, daily world news from top syndicated providers such as CNN and BBC.
